thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Novocure Secures New $150 Mln Non-Dilutive Term Loan Financing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novocure Secures New $150 Mln Non-Dilutive Term Loan Financing
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Novocure Ltd:
* NOVOCURE SECURES NEW $150 MILLION NON-DILUTIVE TERM LOAN FINANCING
* NOVOCURE LTD - ‍PROCEEDS OF TERM LOAN FINANCING USED TO PAY IN FULL NOVOCURE‘S EXISTING $100 MILLION TERM LOAN DEBT AND FUND WORKING CAPITAL ​
* NOVOCURE LTD - ‍AGREEMENT IMPROVES PRICING AND TERMS OF CO‘S EXISTING CREDIT FACILITY & EXTENDS MATURITY OF CO‘S DEBT UNTIL FEB 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
